title: FitTrackerPro
description: A comprehensive fitness tracking web application that helps users monitor their health metrics. This tool features a BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator and a daily calorie needs estimator. Users can input their weight, height, age, and gender to receive personalized health insights. The clean, user-friendly interface makes it easy for individuals to track their fitness progress and set informed health goals.

title: Website Summarizer
description: A dynamic web application to summarize uploaded articles using OpenAI GPT-4 API.

title: Blockchain Farm
description: A decentralized application (DApp) that lets user farm X tokens and earn X tokens.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A dynamic web application that helps users discover new recipes based on ingredients, dietary preferences, and nutritional requirements. Leveraging the powerful Edamam API, this tool offers a vast database of recipes from around the world.

title: Codexchange
description: A pioneering decentralized platform revolutionizing the buying and selling of Web3/Web2 businesses. This innovative marketplace leverages blockchain technology to create a transparent, secure, and efficient environment for digital asset acquisitions.

title: Voice-Controlled Web App
description: This innovative web application leverages cutting-edge voice recognition technology to create an interactive, hands-free user experience. Built with JavaScript and powered by various APIs, including OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo, the app can understand and respond to voice commands, providing a wide range of functionalities

title: OptiPic
description: OptiPic is a powerful, user-friendly web application designed for efficient bulk image compression. This tool allows users to optimize multiple images simultaneously, significantly reducing file sizes while maintaining image quality. Perfect for photographers, web developers, and content creators who need to manage and optimize large image libraries quickly and easily.

title: Split The Bill
description: SplitTheBill is a web application designed to simplify the process of splitting bills among friends, roommates, or colleagues. It offers an intuitive interface for managing shared expenses with percentage-based splitting capabilities.

title: BouncerLink
description: BouncerLink is a sophisticated URL shortening service offering advanced link management features such as link expiration, access control via password or email, click limiting, analytics dashboard for tracking performance, email notifications, and the ability to create custom short URLs for personalized sharing.

title: ProCompress
description: ProCompress is a cutting-edge image compression tool designed to optimize image sizes, enhance website performance, and reduce bandwidth usage. This innovative web application leverages the latest compression algorithms and user-friendly interfaces to deliver fast, efficient image optimization solutions.

title: FashionHub
description: This project is a full-stack e-commerce platform for a clothing shop. It features a React-based frontend and a Node.js/Express backend, with MongoDB as the database. The application allows users to browse products, add items to their cart, place orders, and includes an admin panel for managing products and orders.

title: SmartFitPlan
description: SmartFitPlan is a Next.js-based web application that leverages artificial intelligence to create personalized workout plans and provide nutrition advice tailored to your fitness goals.

title: Mood Tracker Application V1
description: The Mood Tracker is a web application designed to help users log and visualize their daily moods. Users can select from a set of predefined mood emojis or add custom emojis to represent their feelings. The application allows users to add notes to their mood entries, view a history of their moods, and visualize mood trends over time using a chart. Additionally, users can export their mood data as a JSON file for personal records. The application supports both light and dark themes for a personalized user experience.

title: Mood Tracker Application V2
description: An advanced mood tracking web application that helps users monitor their emotional well-being with AI-powered insights. The app features a clean, responsive interface for logging daily moods using emojis, along with journal entries and tags. Key features include personalized AI emotional support, detailed mood analytics showing patterns and trends, tag-based mood correlation insights, and an interactive chart displaying mood history. The application prioritizes user privacy by storing all data locally, while offering a sophisticated dark/light theme system and mobile-first design.

title: Code Documentation Assistant
description: A powerful web application that automates the creation of comprehensive documentation for GitHub repositories. Built with GPT-4 Turbo, this tool analyzes repository content and generates detailed README files with API references, changelogs, and implementation details. Features include a real-time markdown preview, intelligent repository scanning, and a user-friendly interface for seamless documentation generation. Perfect for developers looking to maintain high-quality documentation with minimal effort.

title: Open-Source API Tester
description: A lightweight, browser-based API testing tool for developers to test and organize API requests efficiently without the complexity of traditional tools.

title: Dev Tools Aggregator
description: A comprehensive web-based developer toolkit that combines essential development utilities in one interface. Features include JSON formatter, Base64 encoder/decoder, URL encoder/decoder, Regex tester, Hash generator, UUID generator, Timestamp converter, Markdown previewer, Color converter, JWT decoder, HTTP request tester, CSS minifier, and JSON to CSV converter. Built with a clean, responsive interface and dark mode support, this tool streamlines developer workflows by providing quick access to commonly needed utilities.

title: Insight Flow Analytics
description: A lightweight analytics dashboard that provides users with essential, real-time web traffic insights.

title: WhisperBox
description: A simple SaaS that helps startups, indie hackers, and small businesses gather user feedback quickly and effortlessly. Embed a small widget on your site/app, view all feedback in a centralized dashboard, and iterate based on real user insights.

title: Argument Winner
description: Argument Winner is a web application that helps users quickly find and cite academic studies to support their arguments in real-time discussions. Unlike generic search engines or AI tools that often surface social media content, this tool specifically focuses on academic research papers.

title: Discord-Whatsapp Bridge
description: A Node.js bot that forwards messages from Discord channels to WhatsApp. Messages from specified Discord channels are automatically forwarded to a designated WhatsApp number with preserved formatting and sender information.

title: Tab Mood Tracker Extension
description: Tracks your mood based on websites you visit.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A modern web application built with Next.js and React that helps users manage their personal finances. Track income, expenses, and monitor spending patterns with interactive visualizations.

title: Smart CodeGen
description: A robust, AI-powered CLI tool for efficient React development. Generate React components, custom hooks, and CRUD operations with TypeScript support and industry best practices baked in.

title: AI Agent NBA Props Analyzer
description: NBA Props Analyzer is a tool designed to analyze player props for upcoming NBA games. It leverages various data sources to provide insights and recommendations on player performance metrics.

title: Time Capsule
description: A sleek and interactive website designed to count down the days, hours, minutes, and seconds to the arrival of 2025. It offers a visually engaging experience, complete with dynamic updates, ensuring users stay captivated as they anticipate the future. Whether you're curious about the time left until the new year or simply enjoy tracking moments, this countdown website keeps you informed and excited every step of the way!

title: Contently
description: Contently is a platform that allows users to convert website content into clean, structured Markdown format. It is designed for developers, researchers, content creators, and AI enthusiasts who need efficient and automated solutions for managing, repurposing, and archiving web content.

title: Deepseek AI API Chat Interface
description: A modern, responsive web application for interacting with DeepSeek's AI models. Built with vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS.

title: FinanceAI
description: A modern financial market analysis platform combining real-time market data with AI-powered insights.

title: BSCrypt Finance
description: Boost investor confidence and community trust by securing your token with a liquidity lock. Ensure long-term stability and demonstrate your commitment to transparency and security.

title: Dice Casino
description: A decentralized gambling platform on BNB Chain (BSC) that lets users play a provably fair dice game using BNB.

title: AirBuckets
description: Experience the future of cloud storage with our unlimited, secure, and completely free platform—no hidden fees or limits.

title: Shimmer Design Styles
description: A comprehensive collection of modern shimmer loading effects and skeleton screens.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A modern take on the classic Tic Tac Toe game featuring a clean, responsive interface with smooth animations.

title: PayPort
description: PayPort is a comprehensive digital payment solution that allows users to manage various financial transactions seamlessly.

title: Harmony AI
description: As the developer behind Harmony AI, I worked closely with my client to create a comprehensive mental wellness platform offering personalized therapeutic tools and guided self-reflection capabilities.

title: DineZap
description: DineZap eliminate the slow, manual ordering process that hurts both customer experience and restaurant revenue. Customers scan a QR code at their table to order and pay instantly via their phone, eliminating wait times and boosting restaurant efficiency.

title: RecipeShare
description: RecipeShare is a modern, user-friendly web application designed to bring food enthusiasts together to share, discover, and review recipes. Built with a mobile-first, accessible, and responsive design, RecipeShare fosters a vibrant community where users can create, save, and explore recipes tailored to their preferences.

title: ChaoS/UI
description: A brutalist React component library that says 'NO' to minimalism. Perfect for developers who want UI that stands out.

title: GlitchLabs
description: GlitchLabs is a creative technology studio that builds digital experiences where beautiful chaos disrupts the ordinary. This portfolio website showcases our signature digital brutalism aesthetic.

title: GLADIUS
description: A hilariously awesome pixel fighting tournament platform that brings back the joy of childhood doodles! Features real-time tournaments, unique fighter classes, live battle simulations, and tournament brackets.
